data.name: Veelancing
data.description:
VEE Token (VEE) is the native token of Veelancing, a blockchain-powered marketplace for freelancers.

With just a few refinements to be done until the mid-2021 official launch, Veelancing brings freelancing back to its peer-to-peer origins. 

On Veelancing platform, customers may post a job for which they require a freelancer's help while the freelancer may create a personalized profile for himself and/or bid for an existing specific job.
After a freelancer and a customer agree the terms of the job and set specific milestones, a smart contract is created. The customer pays in VEE tokens the price of the job (may as well use crypto or FIAT like a credit card in local currency as instant exchange feature is available), the tokens are stored in blockchain, and then if the smart contract conditions are met, the freelancer will be instantly paid; if not, the funds are returned to the customer. Veelancing charges the smallest fee on the market - 3% for any job completed on the platform, if not in a promotional period when fees are even smaller.

Being powered by blockchain technology, Veelancing wants to overcome the major issues of the current freelancing industry, by offering:

•complete transparency
•highly secure environment
•accessibility to all
•the bringing of the industry back to its P2P origins
•elimination of third-party mediation
•instant payments
•user voting for platform changes and new features
•minimal fees
•cold wallets
 
Veelancing aims to create an environment where both freelncers and talent seekers may actually feel that the platform belongs to them. That's why we implemented a long series of features (the smallest fee, crypto-friendliness, voting rights for users, badges, achievements, token bonuses for early joiners, token incentives for suggesting new features or eventual bugs, higher security, and the list is long). 

The team behind Veelancing now comprises 10 members, all of them crypto/tech/blockchain enthusiasts, working in different fields (IT, programming, cyber-security, financial, data analysis, business development, marketing, content creation, graphic design, etc) and managing to complement themselves as a whole. 

Veelancing is now in the Pre-ICO campaign and the ICO will follow shortly.
